programme.desc: הכל רגוע ושקט בבי"ס לפיות בו עובדות הפיות של מועדון ווינX. השלווה מופרת כשחבורת טריקס המרושעת מגיעה לאוקינוס האין-סופי, במטרה לכבוש את כס המלכות. דיבוב עברית: עדי זינו, מירב דמארי. במאי: איג'יניו סטראפי. 2014. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: שומרת הדרקונים (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציית הרפתקאות. קיסר מרושע שכעת שולט בסין העתיקה, כולא את הדרקונים, שהיו בעבר חברים של בני האדם. ילדה צעירה ומלאת תושייה, עוזרת לדרקון האחרון שטרם נשבה לברוח, ויחד הם מנסים להציל את שאר הדרקונים. דיבוב עב': ניר ברק. 2024.(n)

programme.title: מעופפת (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. התלמידה הכי מעופפת בבית הספר לפיות שיניים, מוצאת את עצמה תקועה בעולם "האמיתי" אחרי משימה מבולבלת במיוחד. כעת, בעזרת ילדה בשם מקסי, היא תצטרך למצוא את הדרך בחזרה הביתה, לעולם הקסמים. דיבוב עב': שחר קדוש. 2022.(n)

programme.title: שון כבשון: הסרט
programme.desc: אנימציה. שון הוא כבשון חכם ושובב שחי בעדר תחת פיקוחו של פארמר וכלבו ביטצר. החיים בחווה הפכו להיות קצת שגרתיים מידי עבורו, והוא מתכנן לצאת ליום חופש - מה שגורם לפארמר לאבד את החווה. במאים: מארק ברטון, ריצ'רד סטארזאק. 2015.\r\n.(n)

programme.title: אגדת שלג (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. בצפון הרחוק, במרחבי השלג האין סופיים, נמצא שבט אחד העומד בפני סכנת רעב. שלושה אסקימואים צעירים יוצאים למסע הרפתקאות בעקבות האגדה של סרילה, על-פיה קיימת ארץ מובטחת שתציל את כולם. במאית: ננסי פלורנס. 2013. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: כבשים וזאבים (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה לכל המשפחה. גריי, הזאב החביב, רוצה להיבחר למנהיג הלהקה, ואף מסתכן בכישוף, שלהפתעתו הופך אותו לאיל! מי שבאים לעזרתו הם הכבשים מהעדר השכן. דיבוב: אורי זלצמן. בימוי: אנדריי גאלאט, מקסים וולקוב. רוסיה, 2016. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: קפטן תחתונים: הסרט (מדובב)
programme.desc: קומדיית אנימציה עפ"י סדרת הספרים המצליחה. ג'ורג' והרולד השובבים הצליחו לשלב בין אהבתם לקומיקס ותעלולים, והפכו את מנהל ביה"ס הקשוח לקפטן תחתונים, גיבור העל הקצת מגוחך. דיבוב: עידו מוסרי. במאי: דיוויד סורן. 2017. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: משפחה בהחלפה (מדובב)
programme.desc: אנימציה. במשפחה זו לכל אחד צרות משלו. ההורים שקועים בעבודות משעממות וכושלות, פיי הבכורה מתאהבת בקלות ומקס החנון סובל מהצקות בבית הספר. חיי המשפחה משתנים כשהם מחליטים לערוך מסיבת תחפושות. במאי: הולגר טאפה, 2017. כ' עב'.(n)

programme.title: הנסיך וסינדרלה (מדובב)
programme.desc: פנטזיית הרפתקאות לכל המשפחה בדיבוב של אליאנה תדהר. סיפורה של סינדרלה, נערה יפת תואר וטובת לב, שאמה ואחותה החורגות מתייחסות אליה כמו למשרתת. חייה משתנים כשבאחד הטיולים שלה ביער היא פוגשת בנסיך הממלכה. עם: אסטריד אס. 2021.(n)

programme.title: הדב פדינגטון
programme.desc: סרט ילדים קסום, משעשע ונוגע ללב שכבש את העולם. עלילותיו של פדינגטון: דב מתוק, נבון ודי שובב, המגיע ללונדון מיערות פרו הרחוקים ופוגש משפחה המעניקה לו בית חם. עם: יו בונוויל, ניקול קידמן. במאי: פול קינג. בריטניה, 2014.(n)

programme.title: ספיידרמן: ברחבי ממדי העכביש
programme.desc: אנימציית אקשן שוברת קופות, מועמדת לפרס אוסקר 2024. מיילס מוראלס, הספיידרמן הצעיר, חוזר לשתף פעולה עם שלל אנשי ונשות עכביש מרחבי העולם כדי להילחם בנבל מרושע ועוצמתי מתמיד. דיבוב: שאמיק מור. במאי: חואקים דוס סנטוס. 2023.(n)

programme.title: כוכב עד הבית

programme.title: כוכב עד הבית
programme.desc: שידור חוזר: אביתר מקנא בחברו לקבוצה לאחר שזומן לקבוצת הבוגרים. אייל ברקוביץ, גדול שחקני ישראל בכדורגל, מגיע לתת טיפים לאביתר על קנאה, תחרותיות וגם איך הרגשות האלה יכולים לדרבן ולהוציא ממך את המקסימום.(n)

programme.title: כוכב עד הבית

programme.title: כוכב עד הבית
programme.desc: שידור חוזר: לאביתר לא מסתדר עם המאמן החדש. משחקן מפתח אביתר עבר לשחקן ספסל. עודד קטש, מאמן מכבי ת''א, מגיע לאביתר כדי לעזור, מספר לו על יחסי מאמן שחקן, מי הוא מאמן טוב ואיך מתמודדים עם מאמן שלא עושה ''חיים קלים''.(n)

programme.title: כוכב עד הבית
programme.desc: שידור חוזר: אביתר חווה משבר - רגע שבו הרגיש מושפל על המגרש התפרסם ברשתות עם אלפי צפיות. מאמן מכבי חיפה, ברק בכר, מגיע לשיחה כנה עם אביתר על מנהיגות בתוך ומחוץ למגרש, על הדרך משחקן למאמן ועל הרגעים הפחות טובים.(n)

programme.title: כוכב עד הבית
programme.desc: שידור חוזר: אביתר מאוכזב מאוד לאחר משחק כדורסל בו קיבל בראש מצמד תאומים ענקיים. תמיר בלאט עוזר לאביתר להבין איך להתמודד עם הפסד, חוסר ביטחון, הבדלים פיזיים ויכולות על המגרש.(n)

programme.title: כוכב עד הבית

programme.desc: Plymouth Argyle v Sheffield United (Kick-off 12.30pm). Coverage of the Championship match from Home Park, as the teams meet for the second time this season. Goals from Gustavo Hamer and Kieffer Moore secured all three points for the Blades in the reverse fixture art Bramall Lane last December.(n)

programme.title: Live: SNF
programme.desc: Arsenal v Brentford (Kick-off 5.30pm). Coverage of the Premier League match from Emirates Stadium, as the two London clubs go head to head. The hosts won the reverse fixture on New Year's Day as they came from behind to win 3-1 at the Gtech Community Stadium. Bryan Mbuemo scored a 13th-minute opener for Brentford before goals from Gabriel Jesus, Mikel Merino and Gabriel Martinelli gave Arsenal the three points.(n)

programme.title: The Masters - Live
programme.desc: Coverage of round three of the first Major of the year, held at Augusta National Golf Club in Georgia. Eventual champion Scottie Scheffler held the lead at the end of the third day last year on seven-under, with his American compatriot Colin Morikawa one stroke behind him. Scheffler held onto his lead on the final day to claim his second Masters title in three years after his first success in 2022.(n)

programme.title: Live SPFL
programme.desc: Aberdeen v Rangers (Kick-off 12.00pm). Coverage of the Scottish Premiership match from Pittodrie. These two sides have met twice in the league already this season, winning one game each. This meeting back in October saw Aberdeen come away with a 2-1 victory thanks to Shayden Morris' 74th-minute winner. Nicky Devlin had given the hosts the lead in the first half before Nedim Bajrami scored in the 63rd minute for Rangers, only for Morris to score nine minutes later for Aberdeen to win the game.(n)

programme.title: Live Super Sunday
programme.desc: Liverpool v West Ham United (Kick-off 2.00pm). Coverage of the Premier League match from Anfield, as the hosts look for three more points in their quest for the league title. Liverpool came away from the London Stadium with a 5-0 victory in the reverse fixture at the end of December. Goals from Luis Diaz, Cody Gakpo and Mohamed Salah gave the Reds a 3-0 lead at half time, before Trent Alexander-Arnold and Diogo Jota completed the scoring in the second half.(n)

programme.title: Live Super Sunday
programme.desc: Newcastle United v Manchester United (Kick-off 4.30pm). Coverage of the Premier League match from St James' Park. The hosts are on a good run of form against the Red Devils having won four of the last five meetings between the two sides. The reverse fixture at the end of December saw Alexander Isak and Joelinton score in the opening 19 minutes to give the Magpies a 2-0 victory at Old Trafford.(n)

programme.title: The Masters - Live
programme.desc: Coverage of the fourth and final round of the first Major of the year, held at the Augusta National Golf Club in Georgia. Scottie Scheffler's concluding round of 68 in last year's tournament helped him finish four strokes clear of Ludvig Aberg to win this title for the second time in three years. The American could join the likes of Nick Faldo, Phil Mickelson, Gary Player and Jimmy Demaret in becoming a three-time winner at this event.(n)

programme.title: Live IPL
programme.sub-title: Lucknow Super Giants v Chennai Super Kings 14.04
programme.desc: Lucknow Super Giants v Chennai Super Kings. Coverage of the T20 match from BRSABV Ekana Cricket Stadium, Lucknow. This meeting last year was easily won by the hosts as they came away with an eight-wicket victory. Chennai made a below-par 176-6 in their 20 overs with Ravindra Jadeja top-scoring with 57 not out from 40 balls, but KL Rahul led the way for Lucknow with 82 from 53 balls as they chased down their target with an over to spare.

programme.title: Live MNF
programme.desc: Bournemouth v Fulham (Kick-off 8.00pm). Coverage of the Premier League match from Vitality Stadium, as both teams look for three vital points in their quest for a European place. The reverse fixture in late December saw the hosts come from behind twice to come away with a 2-2 draw from Craven Cottage. Raul Jiminez and Harry Wilson had twice given Fulham the lead, but goals from Evanilson and Dango Ouattara earned Bournemouth a point.

programme.title: Burlesque
programme.desc: A woman goes to work as a cocktail waitress at a burlesque club which is teetering on the brink of closure. The manager gives her the chance to perform and she has soon become the venue's star attraction, drawing the attention of a sleazy developer with plans for the site. Musical drama, starring Cher, Christina Aguilera, Cam Gigandet and Stanley Tucci.(n)

programme.title: Rurangi
programme.desc: After leaving a decade earlier, a transgender activist returns to the remote community of Rurangi, hoping to reconnect with his father. Drama, starring Elz Carrad and Arlo Green.(n)

programme.title: Footloose
programme.desc: A rebellious, hip-swinging student from the city moves to a small religious community, where he instantly clashes with an old-school fire-and-brimstone preacher - who has banned dancing and rock 'n' roll because he considers them immoral. Drama, starring Kevin Bacon, Lori Singer, John Lithgow, Chris Penn, Dianne Wiest and Sarah Jessica Parker.(n)

programme.title: Ordinary Angels
programme.desc: A struggling hairdresser discovers a new sense of purpose when she meets a widower working to provide for his daughters. Drama, starring Hilary Swank, Alan Ritchson and Nancy Travis.(n)

programme.title: A Star Is Born
programme.desc: Following a gig, fading music star Jackson Maine happens upon Ally, a nightclub singer-songwriter. Their instant chemistry leads to a tempestuous romance as he helps her on the road to stardom. However, Jackson's alcoholism has explosive repercussions as her career blossoms. Oscar-winning drama, starring Lady Gaga, Bradley Cooper, who also directed, and Sam Elliott.(n)

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Queen Elizabeth I faces threats at home and abroad, as Mary, Queen of Scots plots against her while the King of Spain builds a vast armada to undertake an invasion of England. Unable to reconcile her feelings for the dashing Sir Walter Raleigh with her duty to her country, the monarch engineers a romance between the courtier and one of her ladies-in-waiting. Historical drama sequel, with Cate Blanchett, Clive Owen, Geoffrey Rush and Samantha Morton.(n)

programme.title: Jackie
programme.desc: Following the assassination of her husband, President John F Kennedy, Jacqueline Kennedy battles with grief and trauma to regain her faith, console her children, and define JFK's legacy. Director Pablo Larrain's Bafta-winning drama, starring Natalie Portman, Peter Sarsgaard and Greta Gerwig. Mica Levi provided the Oscar-nominated score.(n)

programme.title: The Great Gatsby
programme.desc: A nouveau riche socialite with a murky past tries to buy his way into high society. A young man from the Midwest is drawn into his glamorous world, and witnesses the playboy's ultimately tragic efforts to win back the love of his life, now married to a far more respectable husband. Oscar-winning drama, based on F Scott Fitzgerald's classic novel, starring Robert Redford, Mia Farrow, Sam Waterston, Bruce Dern, Karen Black and Scott Wilson.(n)

programme.title: Mo' Better Blues
programme.desc: A self-centred jazz trumpeter's single-minded ambition alienates everyone who cares about him. Spike Lee's drama, with Denzel Washington, Wesley Snipes, Joie Lee, John Turturro and the director himself.(n)

programme.desc: A black woman living in West London hopes to marry her boyfriend, but finds her life thrown into upheaval when he loses his job and is subsequently arrested after getting into a fight. The experience makes her reassess her priorities, and she decides to reconnect with her African heritage. Drama, starring Cassie McFarlane and Victor Romero Evans.(n)

programme.title: Anatomy of a Murder
programme.desc: An Army officer is accused of murdering a bartender, whom he claims he killed because the man raped his wife. programme.title: Hawaii

programme.title: Oslo

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: A US congressman gets embroiled in a secret mission to provide covert military support to rebels in Soviet-occupied Afghanistan. Fact-based political drama set during the 1980s, starring Tom Hanks, Julia Roberts and Philip Seymour Hoffman.

programme.desc: British broadcaster and journalist David Frost comes up with the idea of setting up a series of exclusive televised interviews with the disgraced former president of the United States, Richard Nixon. Fact-based drama, starring Frank Langella, Michael Sheen, Sam Rockwell and Kevin Bacon.

programme.title: Justice League
programme.desc: Fantasy action adventure starring Gal Gadot and Ben Affleck. With an ancient demonic threat looming, Bruce Wayne, aka Batman, enlists the help of Diana Prince (Wonder Woman) to form a new superhero team. After adding Aquaman, Cyborg and The Flash to its ranks, the league faces its first challenge: resurrecting Superman.

programme.title: Aquaman
programme.desc: Action fantasy starring Jason Momoa, Amber Heard and Nicole Kidman. Arthur Curry (aka Aquaman), the half-human heir to the throne of Atlantis, has long since rejected his underwater brethren. But when his half-brother and current king Orm plots to destroy the surface world, Arthur is drawn into a quest to unite the marine realms and save humanity.

programme.title: The Radleys
programme.desc: Horror comedy starring Kelly Macdonald and Damian Lewis. Although they blend in with suburban middle-class society, Helen and Peter Radley are secretly abstinent vampires. But when their children suddenly become aware of this "family disease", the parents are forced to seek support from Peter's free-spirited twin, Will, who begins to rouse the family's feral urges.

programme.title: Get Away
programme.desc: A family's holiday to a remote getaway takes a lethal turn when they discover the island they're on is inhabited by a serial killer. Director Steffen Haars' comedy horror, written by and starring Nick Frost, with Aisling Bea and Sebastian Croft.

programme.title: Dangerous Waters
programme.desc: A sailing trip turns into a nightmare when a woman uncovers the dark past of her mother's new boyfriend. Thriller, starring Odeya Rush, Eric Dane, Saffron Burrows and Ray Liotta in one of his final films.

programme.title: The Cinema List: British Sky Originals
programme.desc: Not sure what to watch next? Then discover some of the greatest British Sky Originals. From Four Kids and It to SAS Red Notice, there's something here for everyone.

programme.title: The Shamrock Spitfire
programme.desc: Co Dublin-born fighter pilot Brendan Finucane, known by his colleagues as Paddy, hones his skills in the RAF during the Second World War, eventually becoming the youngest wing commander in its history. Biographical drama, starring Shane O'Regan, Ryan O'Grady and Sophia Eleni.

Historical action adventure starring Gerard Butler, Lena Headey and David Wenham. When the fiercely ambitious King Xerxes of Persia plans to invade Greece, King Leonidas mobilises his personal bodyguard of 300 Spartan warriors to defend the pass at Thermopylae.

programme.title: Wonder Woman
programme.desc: Fantasy action adventure starring Gal Gadot and Chris Pine. Young Diana has been raised a warrior on the secret island of Themyscira, shielded from the perils of the real world. When she rescues an American pilot whose plane crashes off the coast, Diana learns about the horrors of the First World War, and leaves the island with him to fight for peace and justice.

programme.desc: Drama based on a true story, starring Hilary Swank and Alan Ritchson. A struggling hairdresser in small-town Kentucky finds purpose by putting her energies into helping a widowed father get the funds to provide a liver transplant for his youngest daughter.

programme.title: The American Society of Magical Negroes
programme.desc: Satirical fantasy comedy starring Justice Smith and David Alan Grier. Genial artist Aren, who is African-American, is struggling to make sense of his place in the world until he's invited to join a secret society dedicated to enhancing the lives of white people. However, Aren's debut mission tests his loyalty when he and his first assignment fall for the same person.

Needless to say disaster is never far away.

programme.title: Mr Bean's Holiday
programme.desc: Comedy starring Rowan Atkinson. Mr Bean puts the entente cordiale under considerable strain when he wins a camcorder and a trip to France in a raffle. After a typically accident-prone encounter with a Russian film director, the hapless hero ends up at the Cannes film festival.

programme.desc: Musical romantic drama starring Lady Gaga and Bradley Cooper. Rock star Jackson Maine meets aspiring songwriter Ally, a waitress who moonlights as a bar singer. The two begin a romantic relationship, but their happiness is threatened as an increasingly washed-up Jackson grapples with substance abuse i

In an attempt to get rid of him from his job as one of their attendants, the governors of the National Gallery send Mr Bean to America to represent them at the unveiling of the Grierson Gallery's new purchase. Needless to say disaster is never far away.

programme.title: Mr Bean's Holiday
programme.desc: Comedy starring Rowan Atkinson. Mr Bean puts the entente cordiale under considerable strain when he wins a camcorder and a trip to France in a raffle. After a typically accident-prone encounter with a Russian film director, the hapless hero ends up at the Cannes film festival.

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: Oscar-winning musical starring Catherine Zeta-Jones, RenÃ©e Zellweger and Richard Gere. In 1920s Chicago, chorus girl Roxie Hart shoots her lover and winds up in jail, believing her dreams of stardom are over. Enter hotshot lawyer Billy Flynn, whose clients include double murderess Velma Kelly, and Roxie begins to realise that there's no such thing as bad publicity.

programme.title: A Star Is Born
programme.desc: Musical romantic drama starring Lady Gaga and Bradley Cooper. Rock star Jackson Maine meets aspiring songwriter Ally, a waitress who moonlights as a bar singer. Mesmerised by Ally's talent, Jackson invites her to perform with him and she becomes a sensation. The two begin a romantic relationship, but their happiness is threatened as an increasingly washed-up Jackson grapples with substance abuse i

programme.title: Barbie
programme.desc: Satirical fantasy comedy starring Margot Robbie and Ryan Gosling. When blonde and bubbly Barbie experiences a series of sudden crises, she must leave Barbieland to track down her human owner and make things right. But the adoring Ken follows her to Los Angeles where he discovers something called the "patriarchy" and develops some radical ideas...

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love
programme.desc: Biographical music drama starring Kingsley Ben-Adir. In the late 1970s, after being shot and badly wounded on stage in Jamaica, reggae star Bob Marley decamps to the UK, where he and his band work on the album that will make him a global icon.

programme.title: Barbie

programme.title: The Bricklayer
programme.desc: Former CIA agent Steve Vail is reactivated when an extortionist targets the agency. Director Renny Harlin's thriller based on the Noah Boyd novel, starring Aaron Eckhart, Nina Dobrev and Clifton Collins Jr.

programme.title: The American Society of Magical Negroes
programme.desc: Satirical fantasy comedy starring Justice Smith and David Alan Grier. Genial artist Aren, who is African-American, is struggling to make sense of his place in the world until he's invited to join a secret society dedicated to enhancing the lives of white people. However, Aren's debut mission tests his loyalty when he and his first assignment fall for the same person.

programme.title: Ordinary Angels
programme.desc: Drama based on a true story, starring Hilary Swank and Alan Ritchson. A struggling hairdresser in small-town Kentucky finds purpose by putting her energies into helping a widowed father get the funds to provide a liver transplant for his youngest daughter.

programme.title: Red Right Hand
programme.desc: Cash is attempting to live an honest and quiet life, but when Big Cat forces him back into her services, he proves capable of anything to protect the town and the only family he has left. Thriller, starring Orlando Bloom and Andie MacDowell.

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: Musical adaptation of Alice Walker's novel, starring Fantasia Barrino and Taraji P Henson. In early 20th-century Georgia, young Celie is forced to marry the tyrannical farmer "Mister". For years, Celie's life is bleak and difficult, but when Mister's mistress, the spirited jazz singer Shug Avery, comes to stay, Celie begins to believe in herself.

programme.title: The Book of Clarence
programme.desc: Biblical comedy starring LaKeith Stanfield. In AD 33 Jerusalem, debt-ridden criminal Clarence, the ne'er-do-well atheist brother of apostle Thomas, decides to make some much-needed cash by posing as a new messiah. But learning the same "tricks" as Jesus Christ proves tougher than initially assumed.

programme.title: Central Intelligence
programme.desc: A lethal CIA agent (Dwayne Johnson) and his former classmate (Kevin Hart) encounter shootouts, espionage and double-crosses while trying to save the U.S. spy satellite system.

programme.title: Chernobyl
programme.desc: Valery Legasov, Boris Shcherbina and Ulana Khomyuk risk their lives and reputations to expose the truth about Chernobyl.

programme.title: Ghost Dog: The Way of the Samurai
programme.desc: When his boss (John Tormey) turns against him, a hit man (Forest Whitaker) who lives like a samurai must fend for his life.

programme.title: Horizon: An American Saga: Chapter 1

programme.title: The Double
programme.desc: An awkward office drone (Jesse Eisenberg) becomes increasingly unhinged after a charismatic and confident look-alike takes a job at his workplace and seduces the woman (Mia Wasikowska) he desires.

programme.title: Marshall
programme.desc: Young Thurgood Marshall faces one of his greatest challenges while working as a lawyer for the NAACP. He teams up with lawyer Sam Friedman to defend Joseph Spell, a Black chauffeur whose employer accuses him of sexual assault and attempted murder.

programme.title: Morbius
